snippet: Raul Ibanez hit a homer in the ninth to force extra innings, and his game-winning single in the 12th helped give the Yankees a one-game lead over the Orioles before the season’s final day.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Boston Red Sox, 4-3, in 12 innings; Yankees designated hitter Raul Ibanez comes up big twice, giving the team a chance to finish the regular season with the best record in the American League.
lead_paragraph: Raul Ibanez hit a homer in the ninth to force extra innings, and his game-winning single in the 12th helped give the Yankees a one-game lead over the Orioles before the season’s final day.

headline.seo: Late-Night Drama Keeps Yankees Alone in First
headline.main: Title Is in Reach After 2 Hits Aren’t
headline.print_headline: Title Is in Reach After 2 Hits Aren’t
